thread.section_title: RG Riley Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RG Riley | www.rgriley.com
thread.title: Collin Barbour
thread.title_full: RG Riley reviewed by Collin Barbour

author: Collin Barbour
title: Collin Barbour
text:
I was a bit skeptical that the quality of the shirts would be as advertised, however I'm happy to say the shirts arrived a day sooner than expected, packaged very neatly and the quality was EXACTLY as advertised! The sales team was more than helpful! I will definitely be purchasing from you guys on the regular moving forward!
Thank you!
